ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Juno - JADE - L5 : electrons - electrons moments
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set consists of moments data calculated by the JADE (Jovian Auroral 
        Plasma Distributions Experiment) on-board the Juno spacecraft.
          
        Users of these data are encouraged to acknowledge both the PDS and the        
        principal investigators of the instruments whose data are used in analysis    
        in all publications.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Allegrini, F., Wilson, R.J., Ebert, R.W., Hanley, J., 
        JUNO J JOVIAN AURORAL DISTRIBUTION MOMENTS V1.0, 
        JNO-J-JAD-5-MOMENTS-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2022.
        DOI: 10.17189/bryq-qy81

InformationURL.Name: R. J. Wilson. (Version 04.00). JADE Standard Product Data Record and Archive Volume Software Interface Specification
